segments.text: I notice the wide-open cabinet doors, revealing the tempting cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of that jar instantly brings back childhood memories of stealing cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But watching the boy stretching on that unstable stool makes my stomach churn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? The thought sends chills down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but admire how daring he is, reaching high to grab sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands by patiently, and it’s almost like an innocent little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But isn’t there a line between innocent fun and dangerous stupidity?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues drying the plate, blissfully unaware of the brewing disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is admirable, yet I wish she could take a moment to look around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calmness and the children's antics fills me with anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR
